game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the Forbidden Tower
game.description: The ancient artifact has been stolen by the dark forces and is now kept in the Forbidden Tower. Your task is to infiltrate the tower, recover the artifact and bring it back safe and sound.

tasks.objective: Find the location of the Forbidden Tower
tasks.description: The location of the Forbidden Tower is hidden in the old scrolls stored in the Royal Library.
Use stealth and cunning to avoid the dark forces patrolling the tower.
Find and retrieve the stolen artifact from the darkest chamber of the tower.

tasks.objective: Return the artifact to High Mage Eladiun
tasks.description: Bring the recovered artifact back to High Mage Eladiun to complete the quest.
